name: grepa-berry
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases happiness by 10/5/2. Lowers Special Defense effort by 10.
short_effect: Drops Special Defense Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: POKéBLOCK ingredient. Plant in loamy soil to grow GREPA.
flavor_text.emerald: Makes a POKéMON friendly but lowers base SP. DEF.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Can be ground up into a powder as an ingredient for medicine.
